chapter_description.p: The Localization module manages language settings and internationalization in Nelson.
It provides mechanisms to query available languages, determine the current and default language, and change the interface language dynamically.
This module ensures that Nelson can be adapted to different linguistic and regional preferences, supporting a multilingual user experience.

keyword.name: getdefaultlanguage
keyword.description: Returns the default language used in Nelson.

keyword.name: getlanguage
keyword.description: Returns the current language in Nelson.

keyword.name: setlanguage
keyword.description: Changes the language used in Nelson.
